message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.  We can avoid the effects of inflation if we settle this now.
I think a 55/45 split is a fairer starting point, considering the inflation we both face.  Let's work together to avoid losing too much value.
Bob, I understand the impact of inflation, but I also value fairness. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers at 55/45. Let's settle this now before we both lose more.
